original_title: ‘Daddy’ Trump and Western Europe’s oath of allegiance — RT World News
article_summary: "Trump's special envoy, Keith Kellogg, hails the Alaska summit with Putin as a historic step towards peace in Ukraine, urging critics to 'shut up' and praising Trump's direct negotiating style. Both leaders expressed readiness for continued discussions, with Putin open to meeting Zelensky once all issues are resolved."</s>
